animeID:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
animeID:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
animeID:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

animeID:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
animeID:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !animeID:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

animeID:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
animeID:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !animeID:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

animeID:AllMight.NAME: AllMight
animeID:AllMight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose 4 HP. NL Frail for 2 turns.

animeID:Deku.NAME: Deku
animeID:Deku.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

animeID:Mineta.NAME: Mineta
animeID:Mineta.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Retain a card.

animeID:Uraraka.NAME: Uraraka
animeID:Uraraka.DESCRIPTION: Lower the cost of a random Card in hand to 0.

animeID:Momo.NAME: Momo
animeID:Momo.DESCRIPTION: Draw and Discard !M! at the start of each turn.

animeID:Tsuyu.NAME: Tsuyu
animeID:Tsuyu.DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 3 Cards at the end of your turn gain NL !M! Dexterity.

animeID:Bakugo.NAME: Bakugo
animeID:Bakugo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to all enemies. NL On animeID:overkill generate a 0-cost copy of this card.

animeID:Chisaki.NAME: Chisaki
animeID:Chisaki.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn animeID:overhaul.

animeID:Twice.NAME: Twice
animeID:Twice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a copy of this card into your deck this battle.

animeID:SkinnyGum.NAME: SkinnyGum
animeID:SkinnyGum.DESCRIPTION: When you take damage this turn deal double the amount back.

animeID:Hawks.NAME: Hawks
animeID:Hawks.DESCRIPTION: Gain Flight. Generate a Shiv every turn.

animeID:Hatsume.NAME: Hatsume
animeID:Hatsume.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a Card in hand. Gain 1 Artifact.

animeID:Rei.NAME: Rei
animeID:Rei.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots and Channel !M! Frost Orbs.

animeID:Dabi.NAME: Dabi
animeID:Dabi.DESCRIPTION: When you Exhaust Channel a Fire Orb.

animeID:Muscular.NAME: Muscular
animeID:Muscular.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Strength and add 3 Curses into your deck this battle.

animeID:Nomu.NAME: Nomu
animeID:Nomu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Curse in your Exhaust Pile. Can't be Exhausted.

animeID:Rappa.NAME: Rappa
animeID:Rappa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If enemy still has Block generate a 0-cost copy of this card.

animeID:Tengai.NAME: Tengai
animeID:Tengai.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. Can't play any attacks this turn.

animeID:Kirishima.NAME: Kirishima
animeID:Kirishima.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. Can't play any attacks this turn.

animeID:Eri.NAME: Eri
animeID:Eri.DESCRIPTION: Retrieve a Card from the Exhaust pile at the start of your turn. If pile is empty take 5 damage.
